title: Grid Layout
content: The grid system layout is implemented by using the span attribute of the Row, Col component.
findIntroStr: The grid layout makes the layout simple and clear.

title: Alignment
content:
Enable the flex layout by setting the flex property to true. The justify and align attributes are used to adjust the alignment of the child elements.

Prompt

The flex layout has Internet Explorer compatibility issues and can only run on Internet Explorer 10 or later.
findIntroStr: The grid layout makes the layout simple and clear.

title: Sort
content:
When enabling the flex layout, you can set the order attribute of the Row component. Sorts the col with the no attribute.

Prompt

The flex layout has Internet Explorer compatibility issues and can only run on Internet Explorer 10 or later.
findIntroStr: The grid layout makes the layout simple and clear.

title: Offset
content: Specifies the number of columns offset by setting the offset property of the Col component.
findIntroStr: The grid layout makes the layout simple and clear.

title: vertical arrangement
content: Use the align attribute of the Row component to implement the vertical arrangement in flex layout.

title: Grid Interval
content: The grid spacing is implemented by using the gutter attribute of the Row component.

title: horizontal arrangement
content: The justify attribute of the Row component is used to implement horizontal arrangement in the flex layout.

title: Sort by
content: The order attribute of the Row component is used to implement the sorting mode in the flex layout.

title: Custom Element Label
content: The tag attribute of the Row component is used to customize element tags. Any tag is optional.

title: Move
content: Specifies the number of columns offset by setting the move property of the Col component.
findIntroStr: Defines the column configuration information of the layout.

title: Responsive Layout
content: Referring to the responsive design of Bootstrap, five response sizes are preset: xs, sm, md, lg, and xl.
findIntroStr: Defines the column configuration information of the layout.
